name: Unidentified_Shadow_Guard_(Kashyyyk)
content:
This unnamed Shadow Guard was a Human male Emperor's Shadow Guard. He was stationed at the Skyhook at Kashyyyk. He was killed by Darth Vader's apprentice Galen Marek when he stormed the facility and dueled the guard.
At some point, he became a member of the Emperor's Shadow Guard, an elite subdivision of the Emperor's Royal Guard. In 2 BBY, he was stationed at the Skyhook on the forested planet of Kashyyyk. He then, upon learning of several Wookiees breaking free from their captivity, exited the premises to confront Galen Marek, the secret apprentice of Darth Vader, after discovering 
|infiltrated the facility]] to rescue both the Wookiee captives and Princess Leia Organa mowing down the garrison of Imperial Navy commandos, Imperial heavy troopers, Imperial jumptroopers, and Imperial medics. The two engaged in a duel. Marek won, and proceeded to run the guard with his lightsaber.
As a Shadow Guard, he was proficient with a lightsaber pike, using it in the duel. The guardsmen also was able to use the Force to some extent, producing purple Force lightning and able to Force choke. In the end, his skills were no match for that of Marek's.
